comments.content: Adds a new custom trade with the selling and buying items determined by the custom MerchantOffer generator.
The function will only run when the villager resolves the trade.

description.content: What profession this trade should be for.
The level the Villager needs to be.
A generator method to make a new MerchantOffer.

comments.content: Adds a Villager Trade for emeralds for an Item. An example being, giving a villager 2 emeralds for an arrow.

The level the Villager needs to be.

How much Experience is given by trading.

comments.content: Removes a `BasicTrade` Villager trade. `BasicTrades` are trades that allow any item, to any other item. It is only really used for mod recipes and is not used for any vanilla villager trade.

description.content: What profession this trade should be for.
The level the Villager needs to be.
What ItemStack is being sold (by the Villager).

comments.content: Removes a Villager trade for Items for Dyed leather armor. An example being, giving a villager Leather Leggings and 3 Emeralds and getting a Blue Dyed Leather Leggings.

description.content: What profession this trade should be for.
The level the Villager needs to be.
The base ItemStack that a random Dye colour will be applied to. E.G. A leather chestplate with no effect applied.
